content: I was listening to a few podcasts where it was mentioned not having any classes on how hardware/performance. I wonder if this is taught more commonly now? I did have a class a few years ago that was very similar to what you would expect. Here was the syllabus: https://ascslab.org/courses/CSE420/index.html
Yeah, I also had a class on these topics in Belgium in 2013 or 2014
